About.title: Mirza Fakhrul Islam Alamgir: A Life of Politics and Public Service
About.subtitle: A journey of continuous struggle and service from the 1969 student movement to national leadership
About.content: From the 1969 student movement to serving as Chairman of Thakurgaon Municipality, Member of Parliament, State Minister, and since 2016, Secretary General of BNP—his long journey is a unique blend of intellectual firmness, grassroots movement, and national leadership.
About.history: He served successfully as the Mayor of Thakurgaon from 1988 to 1990. He was an Economics lecturer at Thakurgaon Govt College and founder chairman of ESDO.
About.education: Dhaka College (HSC), University of Dhaka (BSS & MSS in Economics)
About.professional: Lecturer in Economics, Inspector at D&I, Private Secretary to Deputy PM under President Ziaur Rahman.
